name: The Gloomy Tomb
description:
A small roguelike for Secret Santa Jam 2022. Happy Holidays Tibor!

Music  graciously donated by local dungeon synth legend "Excellent Strategy Manuals" https://excellentstrategy.bandcamp.com/

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD or ARROWS to play

You have four inventory slots corresponding to the four cardinal directions

Moving over an item on the ground will equip that item to the slot corresponding to the direction you move from. The items spell effect will be triggered in different case based on the item type.  The number in parentheses indicates remaining usages of that item.
